Pre-Game Insights: Switzerland are favored to win against Hungary in their first game of the 2024 European Championships.
The last meeting between these two nations was at the 1938 World Cup, with Hungary winning 2-0.
Switzerland have won six of their last nine games against Hungary, not losing since 1998.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is only the second time these two nations are meeting in the finals of a major tournament.
